{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=Orbi Voice Satellite |revision=(RBS40V) |series=AC2200 |asin=B07GBWZJFC |price=300 |fcc_date=07/26/2018 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |type=wireless system, wireless speaker system |fcc_id=PY318100406 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NE75194K, E075100; |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N02GVSIAA |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q32JVSSIQ |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G63CFR-PBA |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NE75194K, E075100; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NE75194K, E075100; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN FEM;Qorvo;QPF4219;Qorvo, QPF4219, 2278;2;,,, 5 GHz FEM;Qorvo;QPF4518;Q, QPF4518M, 5E48;2;,,, 5 GHz FEM;Qorvo;QPF4518M;Q, QPF4518M, 57J6;2;,,, 32-bit ARM Cortex-M0 PSoC 4;Cypress;CY8C4045AZI-S413;CY8C4045AZI-,S413 TWN1719, B 03 622945;1;,,, Voice Input Processor;Conexant;CX20924-21Z;CX20924-21Z, 1725001, 1725 TW;1;,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 725460;1;, |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Alexa, speaker, Bluetooth 4.1, DFS (master), DFS (slave), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''866Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11ac backhaul (433Mbps per stream), :• '''866Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400Mbps''' - QAM-256 2.4GHz channel = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Orbi Voice Smart Speaker and WiFi Mesh Satellite}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbs40v.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=RBS40V}} Sold as part of the ''Orbi Tri-band Mesh WiFi System with Orbi Voice Smart Speaker and WiFi Satellite (RBK50V)'': * 1x [[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] * 1x [[Netgear Orbi Voice Satellite (RBS40V)]] This device originally hit the FCC under the codename "Netgear Otter." ===News=== *[https://investor.netgear.com/releases/press-release-details/2018/NETGEAR-Debuts-the-Worlds-First-Mesh-WiFi-System-with-Alexa-Built-In-Smart-Speaker-and-Audio-by-Harman-Kardon/default.aspx ''NETGEAR Debuts the World’s First Mesh WiFi System with Alexa Built-In Smart Speaker and Audio by Harman Kardon'' on '''Netgear'''] ===See also=== *[[Netgear Orbi Devices]]
